title: Can't Log In
body:
Hey, I just got kicked from a loading screen and now when I try to log into my account it says that the username or password is incorrect. I can still log in through Boards though so...? 

Also some info is that when I restart the League client, it says something about we have restored this version of the client to an older one? But anyways yeah I just got a loss in my Plat promos because of this...

replies.body: This exact same thing happened to me as well! This is the 2nd time in two weeks where it has 'restored to a previous patch' or whatever. Very frustrating.
same here, 40 min into ranked game, promos, now I will lose, my team will all be flaming me, reporting me, and why? because riot. but yeah il probs not get my promo back so thankyou :)
I have the same exact problem, altough it occoured during ranked game, please before u make us use this disgusting client alteast test it.

Same here. It says my pw is incorrect and i just logged in here. It also told me LoL has reverted back to an earlier version. Luckily I was just trying to play an ARAM so i dont feel as bad as i would if it were a norm/ranked.
It also says that it will try to patch up to the correct version but it doesnt even look like it attempts to do so.

It sounds like something might have been corrupt with your game files, so it reset your client.  To help rule out some possibilities, first make sure that you have the correct region selected.   Then I suggest using the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to run a repair and fix up any bad files.  Try again and let me know if it helps!

The same thing happened to me! I got kicked from the loading screen of my game (literally the last game of my promos), and I cannot get back into the client now for an "incorrect password". I clicked a link to reset my password, and I entered a new password, to which it responded "cannot use old password", but to log into League it tells me that password is incorrect....lol. I still have not been able to log back into the client...

This new patch has put my League through the wringer and I'm likely going to have a leaver buster to come back to. I've run in to the same issue today. It started with the constant DirectX crashes to where the client would revert to a previous version. It was just moments ago when I got the same DirectX crash and the revert that I suddenly couldn't log in. I reset my password a few times in panic, but found out that others were having the same issues. I should also mention that I've done the Hextec Repair Tool as well.

Are you u sing an AMD graphics card?  We've seen a few DirectX issues from  some players using a recent AMD driver update.  In the meantime, we've found that[ rolling back to a previous driver](http://support.amd.com/en-us/download/desktop/previous?os=Windows%2010%20-%2064) has helped.  Let me know if this helps in the meantime.
Same thing is happening to me, nothing i love more than being kicked from a game for no reason.

Same just happened to me. Kicked out of the loading screen, then "we have restored the client to an older version", then no recognition of my password at all. I tried to recover my password to see if anything changed, but it didn't reach my email so I quickly had it changed here, incase it went to a supposed hacker email.

Edit: The client patched itself when I launched it again later, and I was able to get back in with my new password. Lost a game, but the real concern is if this is still happening and how often.
Same here just wanted to join a game but couldnt get into loadscreen and couldnt relog either... They will get the remake i guess but i will get a loss
Just had the same issue, the repair tool as suggested by Porocles fixed it.
Have done a full repair still can't log on.
Upvoting for visibility.  Just had the same thing happen.  Initiating a repair just to make sure.  Hopefully fixes the problem.
